<description>Part 1: Construct a long, thin, rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a curved side. Now, scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector defined earlier. Extrude the 2D sketch along the normal direction by 0.0008 units, creating the prism shape. The height of this prism is 0.0008 units. /// Part 2 (Not provided in the JSON): [Instructions for creating the next intermediate CAD part would go here, following the same format as Part 1.] /// Part ...: [Instructions for creating all necessary intermediate CAD parts would go here, following the same format as Part 1. This shape is achieved by combining all the intermediate CAD parts using the operations defined for each part.</description>
